info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:22PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Polk County through 245 PM CDT... At 221 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mena Intermountain Airport, or near Mena, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mena... Wickes... Grannis... Hatfield... Vandervoort... Opal... Cossatot River State Park... Mountain Fork... Polk County Fairgrounds... Mena Intermountain Airport... Mccauley... Shady... Hartley... Bard Springs Recreation Area... Caney Creek Wilderness... Cove... Acorn... Big Fork... Board Camp... Ink... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
